name: Yuuki (Wip)
description:
Yuuki is a raising simulation game with a rich story.

It is entirely sfw!

You have been tasked with looking after an orphaned foxgirl from the Beastkin race for a few months. However, it is clear they don't think much of her, and her prospects for the future are bad...

Can you take this child and help her turn things around in just a few short months?

What kind of future will you help her achieve?

Teach her various skills; including Archery, Crafts, and Cooking.
Impart knowledge on first aid, herbology, and looking after a forest.
Help her learn interpersonal relationships through jobs and friendships.
Want to let her fight in the arena? Can do! It has state of the art magic technology to keep participants safe.
Help her overcome herself and gain the confidence to seize control of her future.

A cute and heartfelt story, with fluffy tails and headpats.

The game is made in RPGMaker VX ACE, and features fully animated portraits for Yuuki.

You can also accquire multiple outfits for her, including an adorable maid outfit for her cafe job.

There's still a lot to add to the game to fill out the 4 month gametime. So some might want to wait to play it. but I'll be taking suggestions on what people would like to see more of.

I'm at my wit's end here... so i really hope someone has some good ideas

Minigames.
